# R Wikipedia Scraping

### Import library and data

```{r}
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
#load the web page
web_file <- read_html("https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Comma-separated_values&oldid=1278844710")
print(web_file)
```

```{r}
#load the html table
file_table <- web_file %>% html_nodes(xpath = '//h2[contains(., "Example")]//following::pre') %>% html_text()
```

```{r}
#find the correct table
file_table[1]
```

```{r}
data_table <- file_table[1]
```

```{r}
#Create the excel data file
write.table(data_table, file = "vehicle.csv", quote = FALSE, col.names = FALSE, row.names = FALSE)
```

### Analysis with data file
